tasks.task_description: Enhance AI service with provider abstraction and fallback
Create plugin system overhaul with security

description: Phase 3: Advanced Features - AI integration enhancement, MCP integration, workflow automation, plugin system improvements, and remote execution capabilities
context: Created AI provider abstraction with AIProviderManager.js for fallback mechanisms, PromptTemplateEngine.js for dynamic context-aware prompt generation, and ResponseProcessor.js for advanced AI response processing with validation and optimization

Created MCP client integration with MCPClient.js for external tool communication, WorkflowEngine.js for advanced automation with conditional logic and scheduling, enhanced PluginSystem.js with security sandboxing and lifecycle management, and RemoteExecutor.js for secure SSH-based remote command execution

Created comprehensive integration test suite in __tests__/integration/advanced-features.test.js covering AI provider management, prompt engineering, response processing, MCP integration, workflow automation, plugin system security, remote execution, and error handling. All Phase 3 advanced features are now implemented and tested.
